org.daisy.dotify.formatter.impl.core

Class PageTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.dotify.formatter.impl.core.PageTemplate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.PageTemplateBuilder

    public class PageTemplate
extends Object
implements org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.PageTemplateBuilder
    Specifies page objects such as header and footer for the pages to which it applies.

      • getHeader

        public List<org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.FieldList> getHeader()
        Gets header rows for a page using this Template. Each FieldList must fit within a single row, i.e. the combined length of all resolved strings in each FieldList must be smaller than the flow width. Keep in mind that text filters will be applied to the resolved string, which could affect its length.
        Returns:
        returns a List of FieldList

      • getHeaderHeight

        public float getHeaderHeight()

      • getFooter

        public List<org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.FieldList> getFooter()
        Gets footer rows for a page using this Template. Each FieldList must fit within a single row, i.e. the combined length of all resolved strings in each FieldList must be smaller than the flow width. Keep in mind that text filters will be applied to the resolved string, which could affect its length.
        Returns:
        returns a List of FieldList
